INSERT INTO `t_group` (`group_id`, `group_name`, `plan_id`, `if_pause`, `create_date`, `change_date`) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{planId}, 0, NOW(), NOW()); INSERT INTO `t_plan` (`plan_id`, `plan_name`, `budget`, `if_pause`, `create_date`, `change_date`) VALUES (#{planId}, #{planName}, #{budget}, 0, NOW(), NOW()); INSERT INTO `t_group_channel` (`id`, `group_id`, `channel_id`, `price`) VALUES
(#{id}, #{groupId}, #{channelId}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT g.`group_id`, g.`group_name`, p.`plan_name`, p.`budget`, c.`channel_id`, c.`price` FROM t_group g JOIN t_plan p ON p.`plan_id` = g.`plan_id` JOIN t_group_channel c ON c.`group_id` = g.`group_id` LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT g.`group_id` groupId, g.`group_name` groupName, p.`plan_name` planName, p.`budget` budget, c.`channel_id` channelId, c.`price` price FROM t_group g JOIN t_group_channel c ON c.`group_id` = g.`group_id` JOIN t_plan p ON p.`plan_id` = g.`plan_id` WHERE g.`group_name` = #{groupName} AND c.`channel_id` = #{channelId}
